sentence: The liberals' debate over how to respond to Sinema's filibuster stance largely overshadowed the decision by Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., to back a maneuver to weaken the filibuster rule only for the voting rights legislation that he co-sponsored.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Sen. Kyrsten Sinema censured by Arizona Democratic Party executive board over filibuster vote

sentence: Sinema’s fight with the left has overshadowed the 2022 reelection bid of Mark Kelly, Arizona’s other Democratic senator, who will be trying to hold on to the seat he won in a special election.
author: Associated Press
title: Arizona Democrats censure Sinema over voting rights bill

sentence: Sen. Mark Kelly disagrees with the Arizona Democratic Party’s decision to censure Sen. Kyrsten Sinema after she refused to change Senate rules to pass a bill to overhaul federal elections.
author: Seth McLaughlin
title: Sen. Mark Kelly defends Sen. Kyrsten Sinema against Arizona Democratic Party censure

sentence: “By contrast, nearly 3 in 4 Democrats polled — 74 percent — said they view Sen. Mark Kelly (D) favorably, the poll found.
title: ‘A DEMOCRAT JOHN MCCAIN’: Sinema Polling Better With AZ Republicans Than Democrats

sentence: That would be Senator Mark Kelly.
title: The Man at the Center of Arizona’s Primary

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly and Rep. Dave Schweikert are pushing for an extension of telehealth coverage for people enrolled in Medicare beyond 2023.
author: Cami Parrish
title: Sinema, Kelly and Schweikert want extension of telehealth coverage

sentence: Jim Lamon, a Republican Senate hopeful from the state of Arizona, is showing off a new ad that he says will air during the Super Bowl that features him firing a gun at a likenesses of President Joe Biden, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, and Sen. Mark Kelly (D-AZ).
author: Brad Reed
title: Arizona GOP candidate's Super Bowl ad features him firing a gun at likenesses of Biden and Pelosi

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly are warning President Biden against ending Title 42 border restrictions without a "comprehensive plan" in place to ensure order at the southern border -- a sharp contrast to the stance of Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer.
author: Adam Shaw
title: Arizona Dem senators warn Biden against 'sharp end' to Title 42 border restrictions without plan

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ) and Mark Kelly (D-AZ) are pleading with President Joe Biden to preserve border controls that have stemmed illegal immigration at the United States-Mexico border.
author: Blarp Blog
title: Democrats Kyrsten Sinema, Mark Kelly Urge Biden to Enforce Border Controls

sentence: Kyrsten Sinema and Mark Kelly helped torpedo President Joe Biden’s pick to lead an important division of the Labor Department.
author: Yvonne Wingett Sanchez
title: Here's why Sens. Kyrsten Sinema, Mark Kelly helped torpedo a top Biden Labor nominee

sentence: PHOENIX – U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona said Wednesday the Biden administration’s decision to lift a public health ban on asylum seekers at the southern border soon “is a really bad idea” for now.
author: KTAR.COM
title: Arizona Sen. Kelly sees end of COVID border policy as ‘crisis on top of a crisis’
